title: Coronavirus: The Winners And Losers In The Stimulus Bill
description: In order to combat the coronavirus, Congress has passed a $2 trillion-dollar stimulus bill. It targets individuals, small business and large corporations. But, from an economic point of view, who are the real winners and losers in this bill. On this episode, Kate and Luigi analyze the CARES Act. Is it enough money to stabilize our tanking economy, does it target the right people, and does it accomplish the right objectives?
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (University of Chicago Podcast Network)
